hooks.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE_PATH=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // empty"); [[ -z "$FILE_PATH" ]] && exit 0; REPO_ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null); [[ -z "$REPO_ROOT" ]] && exit 0; [[ ! -L "$REPO_ROOT/CLAUDE.md" ]] && echo "CLAUDE.md is not a symlink. Run: ln -s AGENTS.md CLAUDE.md" >&2; exit 0'
